item.title: Teacher Preparation, Curriculum Design, and TA's
item.description: Coxwell-Teague, Deborah, and Ronald F. Lunsford eds. First-Year Composition: From Theory to Practice. Parlor Press, Anderson, SC, 2014. This edited collection provides theoretical background for a hypothetical first-year composition class. Coxwell-Teague and Lunsford ask the contributors1 “what they would do if they taught semester-long first-year composition course at their schools and if they knew such courses were to be the only college-level composition course the students would take” (preface viii)?
